subTitle: Fix-App connects your home and office with verified professionals for every repair. Fast offers, transparent prices and convenient schedule – everything from your phone.
serviceSelectionDescription: Choose the service you need or request an individual offer
problemDescriptionDescription: Describe the problem and attach photos to get accurate offers
offerSelectionAndScheduleDescription: Choose the offer and save when it's convenient for you
verifiedProfessionalsDescription: Every professional on the platform has verified documents and a rating from clients
transparentOffersDescription: You get several offers and choose the best one
flexiblePlanningDescription: Repairs happen when it's convenient for you
securePaymentDescription: The money is protected and released only after the service is completed
callToActionTitle: Are you ready to solve the problem?
callToActionDescription: Fix-App connects your home and office with verified professionals – fast, secure and convenient.
serviceCategoriesTitle3: Building and maintenance of electrical installations
serviceCategoriesTitle4: Technical support for buildings and facilities
somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.
name: First name*
inputEmail: Enter your email and we will send instructions

sentALinkWithInstructions.email: We have sent a link with instructions to ${email}

setDifferentNewPassword: The new password must be different from the previous one

sentAVerificationLink.email: We have sent a verification link to ${email}

enterValidPassword: Password must be at least 6 characters long
enterValidPhone: Phone number can only contain digits and must be at least 10 characters
alreadyUsedPassword: You cannot use a password that has been used before!
enterValidMessage: Message cannot exceed 500 characters and can only contain letters, numbers, and symbols
employeeWillContactYou: A KMP BUILD employee will contact you as soon as possible!
thereWasAMistake: There was a problem starting the app. Please try again later
timeIntervaHint: You can select more than one option.
doYouHaveAdditionalNotes: Provide details and measurements of the issue
awaitingAnOffer: We are waiting for an offer from a worker and will inform you once the right person is available
organisationInfo: Organizations receive a link to attract workers and earn commissions from their activity. They can start working after approval.
companyNameValidation: Company name can contain letters, numbers, and symbols, minimum 3 characters
uniqueIdentifierValidation: UIC can contain letters and numbers, 8-12 characters
inputBankAccount: Enter the bank account to receive payments.
ibanValidation: IBAN can have up to 22 alphanumeric characters
bankNameValidation: Bank name must contain letters and numbers, minimum 3 characters
bankTitularNameValidation: Account holder name can only contain letters, minimum 4 characters
iAgreeWithGeneralTerms: I agree with the general terms
goToYourEmail: Go to your email and click 'Verify Email'
cannotAccessProfile: Due to a violation of our terms, your profile is not accessible
serverError: Something went wrong on our side. We are working on it – try again shortly.
serverNotWorkingError:
Cannot connect to the server.
We are currently having issues connecting. Please try again shortly.
loadingYourDataError: There was a problem loading your data
photoWillBeVisibleFromClients: The photo will be visible in the request for clients and workers
cannotUploadMoreThanFivePhoto: You cannot upload more than 5 photos
theImageTypeIsNotSupported: This image type is not supported, choose JPEG or PNG
errorWhileMakingAPhoto: An error occurred while taking a photo, please try again
errorTimeInterval: The provided interval must meet the client's requirements
noSentOrders: You currently have no submitted requests
noActiveOrders: You currently have no active requests
noOrderHistory: You currently have no request history
enterValidReview: Review cannot exceed 300 characters and can only contain letters, numbers, and symbols
priceTooLow: Price field cannot be empty and cannot be lower than the minimum
priceTooHigh: Price field cannot be empty and cannot be higher than the maximum
priceTooLowUrgent: Price field cannot be empty and cannot be lower than 0
priceNotEqual: Price field must match the given price
repairmanNotYetCompleted: The worker has not yet completed the request

minutesBeforeOrderCompletion.minutes: minutes before the request is automatically completed

orderUnlockOneHourBeforeMessage: The request will be released one hour before the start of the service
timeIntervalError: The second time interval must be after the first
accountDeleted: Your account has been successfully deleted!
areYouSureYouWantToDeleteAccount: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
paymentSuccessfulDescription: Your request has been successfully sent! You can track its status in the 'Active' section.
paymentSuccessfulAdditionalDescription: Your request has been successfully sent!
paymentUnsuccessful: Payment failed! Please try again later.
logoutMessage: Are you sure you want to log out?
neighbourhoodError: Field can only contain letters and numbers
addressError: Field can only contain letters, numbers, and symbols
firstIntervalIsEmpty: First time interval cannot be empty
secondIntervalIsEmpty: Second time interval cannot be empty
firstIntervalIsBeforeNow: First time interval cannot be before current time
secondIntervalIsBeforeNow: Second time interval cannot be before current time
takePhotos: To complete your request, you must take before and after photos!
createOrderQuantityMessage: Quantity (you can request the service multiple times)
deleteOfferConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the sent offer?
deletedUserError: There was a problem logging into the app
orderNotFoundErrorMessage: The request no longer exists or has been taken by someone else.
updateAppHint: A new version is available. It includes:
rejectOrderSuccess: You have successfully canceled the request
rateUsHint: Glad you found what you were looking for! If you are satisfied, please rate us. Your feedback helps improve the app for everyone. Thank you!
enterOrganisationCode: Enter the code of the organization you want to join.
rejectOrderTitle: Provide a reason for rejecting the request
resetOrderTimerHint: The request will be overwritten and the remaining time will restart
complaintHint: Thank you for sharing your experience. If you are not satisfied with the service, you can upload a photo and describe your issue in detail. Your message will be sent directly to our administrators, who will review your case and contact you for further steps. Your feedback helps improve service quality.
complaintPlaceHolder: Describe your problem in detail here…
complaintSentSuccess: Your complaint has been successfully sent. Thank you for your feedback!
qtyValidationHint:
To process a request of this size, we need an on-site inspection first. This allows us to assess the scope and specifications and provide the best solution.
Request an inspection first.
clientOfferMessage: Funds are protected. Payments are securely stored and released only after work is properly completed.
addBankDetails: Add your bank details to receive payment
addBankDetailsHint: The client has already paid. After successful completion, money will be transferred via bank. Provide the required info.
pictureHint: Add up to 5 photos of completed projects
experienceHint: Tell us more about your skills
updatePortfolioHint: Your changes have been submitted. After review, they will be visible to clients.
reviewHint: Only clients who used the service can leave a review.
